headline: Lemon Pasta Sauce
name: Lemon Pasta Sauce
description: This lemon pasta sauce tossed with hot noodles features a rich, tangy blend of butter, beef broth, and cream flavored with lemon juice and lime zest.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine broth, cream, and butter in a large saucepan or skillet. Bring to a simmer over medium heat; cook until reduced by about half. Stir in lemon juice, lemon zest, and lime zest. Set sauce aside.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes; drain.
Add pasta to sauce and toss until well coated.
